snippet.title: Actors Who Lost Their Role Of A Lifetime After A Huge Scandal | Rumour Juice
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp has just lost his role in the Fantastic Beasts franchise after a scandalous court case involving his ex wife Amber Heard. It is not the only instance in the Hollywood history when a top actor was fired and substituted following a huge scandal. It has turned out that no matter how popular and admired the celebrity is, there is always a chance he/she might lose it all.

Actors Who Lost Their Role Of A Lifetime After A Huge Scandal | Rumour Juice
